description: Deletes reviewed answers for Q Topic.

parameters.name: AwsAccountId
parameters.description: The ID of the Amazon Web Services account that you want to delete a reviewed answers in.

parameters.name: TopicId
parameters.description: The ID for the topic reviewed answer that you want to delete. This ID is unique per Amazon Web Services Region for each Amazon Web Services account.

parameters.name: AnswerIds
parameters.description: The Answer IDs of the Answers to be deleted. (string) ---

nested_items.name: TopicId
nested_items.description: The ID of the topic reviewed answer that you want to delete. This ID is unique per Amazon Web Services Region for each Amazon Web Services account.

nested_items.name: TopicArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the topic.

nested_items.name: SucceededAnswers
nested_items.description: The definition of Answers that are successfully deleted.

nested_items.name: AnswerId
nested_items.description: The answer ID for the SucceededTopicReviewedAnswer.

nested_items.name: InvalidAnswers
nested_items.description: The definition of Answers that are invalid and not deleted.

nested_items.name: AnswerId
nested_items.description: The answer ID for the InvalidTopicReviewedAnswer.

nested_items.name: Error
nested_items.description: The error that is returned for the InvalidTopicReviewedAnswer.

nested_items.name: RequestId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services request ID for this operation.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The HTTP status of the request.
